about us

Elizabeth Doherty

Experienced barista from Bahamas. She says that Venezuela has opened her eyes on coffee. "It's not about the taste", she says. "It's all about the feelings".

Max Selfish

Max is the austrian barista with years of experience from the hotels across the whole Europe. "Venezuela coffee was a lightening experience for me! I have never drink such an amazing coffee!", he says.

Ping Nihao

Ping is the youngest in the team. He doesn't like calling coffee a mystierious act. He says, a good coffe is like a mathematical formula. Once you figured it out, every coffee you make is a masterpiece
